metadata.title: CVE-2024-49889 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ext4: avoid use-after-free in ext4_ext_show_leaf()In ext4_find_extent(), path may be freed by error or be reallocated, sousing a previously saved *ppath may have been freed and thus may triggeruse-after-free, as follows:ext4_split_extent  path = *ppath;  ext4_split_extent_at(ppath)  path = ext4_find_extent(ppath)  ext4_split_extent_at(ppath)    // ext4_find_extent fails to free path    // but zeroout succeeds  ext4_ext_show_leaf(inode, path)    eh = path[depth].p_hdr    // path use-after-free !!!Similar to ext4_split_extent_at(), we use *ppath directly as an input toext4_ext_show_leaf(). Fix a spelling error by the way.Same problem in ext4_ext_handle_unwritten_extents(). Since 'path' is onlyused in ext4_ext_show_leaf(), remove 'path' and use *ppath directly.This issue is triggered only when EXT_DEBUG is defined and therefore doesnot affect functionality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-49889` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-127-generic - 5.15.0-127.137
linux-image-5.15.0-127-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-127.137
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-127-generic - 5.15.0-127.137
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-127-generic-64k - 5.15.0-127.137
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1070-kvm - 5.15.0-1070.75
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1073-aws - 5.15.0-1073.79
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1078-azure - 5.15.0-1078.87
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1057-bluefield - 5.15.0-1057.59
Available for NVIDIA BlueField platforms

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1072-gcp - 5.15.0-1072.80
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1070-gke - 5.15.0-1070.76
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1056-gkeop - 5.15.0-1056.63
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1066-ibm - 5.15.0-1066.69
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1071-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1071.77
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-127-lowlatency - 5.15.0-127.137
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-127-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-127.137
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1068-nvidia - 5.15.0-1068.69

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
